summary: Inventory/shopping list app that shows item weights instead of quantities, with eggs displaying a number/count.

existing_features.title: In ProductCard, display a numeric count (e.g., '6 pcs', '12 pcs') instead of weight for egg products only. All other products must continue to show their weight value with the Scale icon. Egg products should be identified by checking if the product's category or name contains 'egg' (case-insensitive).

new_feature_requests.summary: Show number/count for eggs only, while other items show weight
